body:
Hey Guys.


I've started to play Super Smash Bros (Wii U) more often and I thought I could bring it up on Avicus.


A couple of Questions that you can reply with when answering!

Wii U or 3Ds?

Friend Code to play?

Your Main Character(s)?

Your Secondary Character(s)?

Your Worst Character(s)?

What DLC Character(s) do you have?

Favorite Stage?

Would you like to play online with other Avicus Members?

Omega Stage Mode or Normal Stage?

Any other things you want to mention?

Bayonetta VS Corrin?

The Character You wanted in Smash?

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

My Answers to those Questions:

I have both Wii U and 3Ds

I'll give FC later

My Mains: Lucas, Marth

My Secondarys: Ness, Jigglypuff, PacMan

Worst Character: Olimar (srs. how does anyone use this kid)

Favorite Stage: Omega Mode Midgar

Yes

Omega Mode

No

Bayonetta. Lmao. This character is broken af.

Shovel Knight (pls)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Discuss Smash Bros down here vvvvvvvvvvvvvvv

title: Super Smash Bros (Wii U/3Ds)?

replies.body: I want this game so bad. I played this before, I used Greninja and Lucario the most.

replies.body: YES A SMASH THREAD MY LIFE IS COMPLETE<br id="null"><br id="null"><br id="null">3ds<br id="null">FC: 3282-5121-8881<br id="null">Mains: Sheik, Luigi, Diddy, Cap<br id="null">Secondaries: Bayonetta, Roy, Ryu, Cloud, Corrin, Fox, Bowser (Can play a few more just wanted to keep it short xD)<br id="null">Worst: Anyone else (unless I get a suggestion to try that character out then I will see)<br id="null">I have all DLC expect for Lucas (might get him tho I have enough $)<br id="null">Favorite Stage: Dreamland 64<br id="null">I would love to play with Avicus members online<br id="null">Either Stage is fine, unless there are stage hazards.<br id="null">Other things to mention: Sheik. Just. Sheik<br id="null">Um.....Bayonetta? Idk both are seeing good play, just Bay with her combos....<br id="null">TBH, I wanted John Cena in smash (wasn't to serious about that...)<br id="null"><br id="null">Is Lucas good for a person who likes combos? replies.body: All I use is aerials. Mostly fair to get the person off stage then bair to keep them off. Usually Down Special to shoot them horizontally away and rarely use standard special. His grabs are good though especially his up throw and back throw.
replies.body_tagged: All I use is aerials. Mostly fair to get the person off stage then bair to keep them off. Usually Down Special to shoot them horizontally away and rarely use standard special. His grabs are good though especially his up throw and back throw.

replies.body:
Okay, first of all, you can have that many mains and secondaries. I think you just like playing with them all, and you don't really main them. Anyways here is my stuff.

Mains: Zelda, Pikachu
Secondaries: Roy if needed
Worst: The Doc
I have all the DLC
Favorite Stage: Battlefield
I only play the Wii U version

P.S: I play Project M more if you kiddies know what that is.

replies.body: Bro, even the best player in the world doesn't play that many characters. He plays 3 and one of them he rarely plays with, cause he isn't that confident with them. You aren't that good with that many characters, but maybe you know all of the moves with those characters.
